name: Embroidery Kit
description: This comprehensive embroidery kit includes everything you need to create stunning embroidered designs. Perfect for beginners and experienced embroiderers alike.

name: Knitting Needles Set
description: A set of high-quality knitting needles in various sizes, suitable for all your knitting and crocheting projects. Made from durable materials for long-lasting use.

name: Quilting Fabric Bundle
description: Get creative with this assortment of premium quilting fabrics. Perfect for quilting enthusiasts looking to add variety to their projects.

name: Beadwork Starter Kit
description: Start your journey into the world of beadwork with this beginner-friendly kit. Includes a variety of beads, threads, and tools to help you create beautiful beadwork designs.

name: Tie-Dyeing DIY Kit
description: Unleash your creativity with this tie-dyeing DIY kit. Experiment with different colors and patterns to create unique tie-dye designs on clothing and accessories.

name: Macrame Plant Hanger
description: Add a bohemian touch to your home decor with this handmade macrame plant hanger. Perfect for displaying your favorite indoor plants in style.
